item.title: Introducing the ggbrain R-package for brain segmentations
item.description: Iâ€™ve not written a post in a while. Mostly because of summer vacation, and also because I have been a little swamped at work. Fortunately, I got back to work with new gusto in August, and have something exciting to show you! A while a go, my co-worker Didac, approached me with an idea for creating the possibility to plot brain segmentations directly in R. I loved the idea, and went straight at it, though, overly complicated and the initial project I started is a little stalled.
